meanings.definition: A person who extorts money or other favors from someone by threatening to reveal embarrassing or damaging information.
meanings.sent1: The blackmailers demanded money from the victim in exchange for not sharing their secrets.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the blackmailers who had been targeting local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The blackmailers tried to scare the cat into giving them treats by pretending to know its embarrassing secrets.
meanings.sent4: The dark cloud of blackmailers loomed over the town, ready to strike at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The image of the blackmailers lurking in the shadows haunted her dreams.
